sentences: Käytännössä kaikilla on vuorossa olevia tehtäviä.
context: The Finnish word 'vuoro' refers to a turn, duty, shift, or time slot when someone is scheduled to perform tasks or take responsibility. It can be used in various contexts such as work shifts ('työvuoro'), taking turns ('minun vuoroni'), or scheduled time slots (appointment 'vuoro'). The word indicates an allocated period of time during which someone has a specific role or duty.
